texto: projects that addresses the strategic objectives of the organization 3.1.39 qualification process of demonstrating whether an entity is capable of fulfilling specified requirements 3.1.40 quality assurance part of quality management focused on providing confidence that quality requirements will be fulfilled [SOURCE: ISO 9000:2015] 3.1.41 quality characteristic inherent characteristic of a product, process or system related to a requirement Note 1 to entry: Critical quality characteristics commonly include those related to health, safety, security assurance, reliability, availability and supportability. 3.1.42 quality management coordinated activities to direct and control an organization
